Description: To verify that channel User can redeem the Loyalty Points through USSD
To verify that Channel User can not redeem their Loyalty Points through USSD if Channel User PIN is incorrect
To verify that Channel User can not redeem the loyality points if redemption points entered is zero
To verify that Channel User can not redeem the loyality points if redemption points entered is more than the acumulated points
To verify that Channel User can not redeem the loyality points if redemption points entered is in Decimal
To verify that Channel User can not redeem the loyality points if redemption points entered is in negative
To verify that Channel User can not redeem the loyality points if no points entered for redemption
